body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Noteworthy, the finest music school in town. My name is Michael Nelson. May I have your name, please?

Hi Michael, I'm Andrea Butler.

Nice to meet you, Andrea! How can I assist you today?

I'm interested in learning more about your pricing options for piano lessons.

Certainly, Andrea. Our pricing varies depending on the length and frequency of the lessons. Could you tell me which level of piano classes you are interested in?

I'm a beginner looking for weekly sessions.

Great! For beginners, we have a package of thirty-minute weekly sessions at a rate of four zero zero dollars per month. Can I ask for your email address so I can send you some further information?

Sure, my email is andrea.butler@email.com.

Thank you, Andrea. Also, could you please provide me with a contact number just in case we need to reach you?

Of course, my phone number is five five five - one two three - four five six seven.

Thank you for providing your details, Andrea. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out to us anytime. Have a wonderful day!

Thanks, Michael! I appreciate the help.

You're welcome, Andrea. Thank you for your time, and we look forward to having you at Noteworthy!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Michael Nelson from Noteworthy discusses pricing with Andrea Butler. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.

You're welcome, Andrea. Thank you for your time, and we look forward to having you at Noteworthy!
